## CCSelectorCombinedProps.name property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An HTML `name` attribute passed to the input subcomponent of the combined component. Name attribute is a string specifying a name for the input. This name is submitted along with the control's value when the form data is submitted. See [https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input\#name](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#name) for more information.

**Signature:**

```typescript
name?: string;
```
